```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(miceadds)
source.all(path="R")
```

## Scenario 1

```{r}
# simulate data (default dimensions set in simulate_scenario fucntions)
data1 <- simulate_scenario1()

# fit the LowFR model
m1 <- fit_LowFR(data1$y_obs, data1$X_obs, output="all", burnin=100, samples=100)
```

```{r}
# summarize accuracy of fitted model estimates of main and interaction coefficients
m1_accuracy <- summarize_accuracy_LowFR(data1, m1)

# summarize mixing diagnostics for main and interaction samples
m1_diagnostics <- summarize_mixing_LowFR(m1, num_samples=100, num_chains=4)
```
